2009.title: Started my BS degree
description: Majored in Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of Colorado

2011.title: First engineering internship at Cirrus Logic
description: Worked with inventors to write patent applications for electrical LED designs
Spent a super hot summer in Austin, Texas!

2012.title: Returned for second summer of internship at Cirrus Logic
description: Joined Product Marketing Engineering team to see if I wanted to pursue marketing or stay technical (the answer was technical in the end)
Worked on LED product marketing
Spent another summer in Weird Austin

2013.title: Finished BS degree, accepted first job
description: Graduated with BS in Electrical and Computer Engineering at University of Colorado
Moved to Orange County, California for a full-time position at Western Digital as a computer engineer
Achieved my dream to live in Southern California

2014.title: Switched positions at WD to become an embedded software engineer
description: Changed teams in Western Digital
Lead the design and implementation of boot ROM firmware for new SoCs. Implemented in C
Lead the design and implementation of an automation test framework for electrical characterization. Implemented in MATLAB OOP

2016.title: Got promoted to senior embedded firmware engineer
description: At Western Digital
Became lead designer and implementer of boot ROM firmware

2017.title: Left WD. Accepted a graduate school research position and started MS degree
description: Wanted to learn more computer science topics
Started a MS in Computer Science at University of California, Riverside
Researched Data Mining techniques under Professor Eamonn Keogh

2019.title: The year of many changes!
description: Left Grad School after completing 80% of degree with 3.9GPA
Decided to take some time off from industry
Got married
Wanted to change gears to switch to doing more front end development
Built experience with front end web development technologies: HTML, CSS/CSS3, Javascript/ES6+, React
Taught math in my free time

2020.title: Actively Seeking Front End Development Position
description: Seeking front end developer positions!
Working on personal projects
Teaching math in my free time
